snippet: Shares of companies in the energy industry declined, but the market was still on track for a small weekly gain.
abstract: Stocks fall modestly as oil companies continue slump in earnings.
lead_paragraph: Shares of companies in the energy industry declined, but the market was still on track for a small weekly gain.

headline.main: Market Wavers After Weak Earnings From Exxon and Chevron
headline.print_headline: A Seesaw Week but Wall St. Ends It Up 1%
